response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed all expectations. It is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence and quality. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe its true value lies well beyond $1,200,000. However, for your consideration, I am offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to make a decision soon to secure this extraordinary opportunity. If you have any questions or need more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1100000}
